segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care about the stool tipping or the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the jar, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen like that or if she’s just lucky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on grabbing those cookies, he doesn’t see how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear their excited whispers as they sneak treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother is so close, but she’s completely missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’ve done this before, and she still hasn’t caught on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes everything look so calm, but it’s anything but.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it this time, but I doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR
